Author: Emik
Description: Under time pressure, count occurrences of specific patterns in a grid as their color fades away to obtain a word that is submitted using the letters in the buttons' colors. Tags: dark-gray-background, dark-gray-module, 7-segment, 2-displays, 7x7-grid, 7-by-7, timer, timed, 3-wires, 2-buttons, 8-buttons, 10-buttons, 26-colors, 36-markers, 6x6-grid, 6-by-6
Name: Phosphorescence

Souvenir.Explanation:
What button presses solved the module?
What was the word to submit?
What was the offset?
